p: Of dogs with brain biopsy, 3/7 had a focal MRI lesion. Forebrain was affected in 7/7, thalamus in 2/7, brainstem in 2/7 and cerebellum in 2/7. Lesions involved grey and white matter. 2/7 had a midline shift and 1/7 showed foraminal herniation. CSF was non‚Äêinflammatory in 7/7 and 2/7 showed albuminocytologic dissociation.
